name: Laserworm
description:
This is a fast-pased clone of the classic Snake. Try to beat your personal highscore!

------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Collectables:

Pinky: 1 point

Skull of Doom: instant death - beware!

Speedy: 5 points and temporary speed up

Destroyer: 5 points, shortens your worm

Flipper: 5 points and mirrored screen

Enemy: 10 points if you can kill it... or if it kills itself

Additional Rules: 

extra life every 100 points

Destroyer every 50 points

------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

PS: This is the fifth game of my "release a game every month in 2022" challenge. 

If you want to support this challenge, feel free to click the donate button above, recommend this game or be one of my first Patrons. Thanks :)

January game: A Warehouse Story

February game: Curse of the Blob King

March game: Smash the Plumber

April game: Irrlicht Apprentice

Month of Shame (May): ZZZzzzzZZZZzz
